document.full_text: jon lester coasted to his a.l.-leading seventh win and visiting boston scored seven runs off cleveland's mitch talbot in the first inning of the indians' most lopsided loss this season.
document.title: roundup: red sox roll past indians
lines_and_colors: jon lester coasted to his a.l.-leading seventh win and visiting boston scored seven runs off cleveland's mitch talbot in the first inning of the indians' most lopsided loss this season.
